nodes.text: X39-R32 was the designation of a battle droid which was around 3642 BBY located on Hoth inside Tromper Crags mineral mine, where it was destroyed.

X39-R32 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on the planet Hoth. It is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was killed.
